short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly save media links from around the web into your CLIPKICK media playlists to watch later and share; privately and securely.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Curate your vision with the CLIPKICK browser extension for Chrome and easily save links to your media playlists called lineups in CLIPKICK. Watch the media later and share with your connections if you like. Media plays embedded or opens in a separate browser window.

The browser extension offers a floating button and a save button on compatible videos. Click when you want to save the weblink to CLIPKICK without leaving the website. Move or hide the floating button at any time.

You can organize your links and combine them with your own uploaded media in your lineups and watch them any time on any device.
